Siegel Gale

Senior Interaction Designer

Los Angeles, CA from 2014

At Siegel+Gale, you’ll put your skills to work by helping us create experiences that delight and engage consumers for some of the most well-known brands in the world. We work in all the spaces and places people interact with an organization—internally and externally—through print, online, mobile, tablet and physical spaces. We believe that individual interactions, even the most fleeting ones, matter just as much as the overall experience—and the strategies we develop reflect that. Are you nodding your head, wondering why you’re not already working here? Then you should be our Senior Interaction Designer at Siegel+Gale.
